description: very good UI and editor for notes and a pretty management

I was actually looking with this kind of application. there are several things in my mind and I can now easily manage my tasks and thoughts. 
I hope it will be used by many people.

I was playing around with sticky-note like systems for taking quick notes. Save yourself the hassle. This app's UI is really clean, the note organization is simple and straightforward, the notes have good options for formatting your text, and you don't have to even save your notes, they just work.
summary: This note management tool is Awesome

description: This is very good app for notes taking, however, the feature of export to PDF pops out to window to save but can't find the PDF in the folder.
summary: Very good but export to PDF feature is not working

description: this app has a very nice UI and easy to use
summary: this app would be perfect if we can adjust font-size in notes

description: Wonderful app with nice Look and Feel. I am a programmer and its more than enough for taking my notes. Thanks team.
I think app is optimal for daily usage with minimal requirements and categorization

I quite like this application and I would recommend it however, it takes close to 40 seconds to open on my desktop, which I don't think is its fault. If it was a deb package I imagine that this would be a 4 or 5 star app.
summary: Nice, clean app spoiled by snap performance

description: Nice UI and simple editor with good organization of note contents. Thanks to the developer and keep improving it

I just love this app.
It is excellent for online class notes and systematization of PDF texts.
The automatic save feature has already saved me more than once and the export via pdf is perfect.
Creating notebooks also helps me a lot.

Two features that I miss that could be included at some point:
- Search bar within the annotations section.
- Shortcuts for editing notes. (For example: Ctrl + B for bold, Ctrl + H for hightlight, etc.) 

Thanks for the amazing work.
summary: One of the best apps I've ever installed

description: It's a little slow but 100% best notes app in the Ubuntu Software store
summary: The app it's self looks great! bit slow tho

description: Good app and i love it!
Simple Express Js App, This is Good !!
as stated earlier, little bit slow, but fantastic for note taking
Excelente interfaz y muy buen funcionamiento, me parece la mejor app de notas para ubuntu
Nice interface. very useful, very simple and intuitive. It is definitely a note manager that I will use daily.
Una interfaz muy buena, el programa no es difícil de usar, lo recomiendo mucho.
summary: Muy buen interfaz y fácil de utilizar

description: Serait mieux au format Markdown. Le format propriétaire ne permettrait pas de changer facilement si un jour le besoin s'en faisait ressentir.
summary: Assez bonne application de prises de note

description: Simple,facile d'utiliser et surtout une moderne interface.

Catégories, notes et mise en page basique, c'est la bonne combinaison qui remplace mon ancien Keepnotes. Merci !

J'ai des notes qui remontent à 20 ans, prises sur mon Palm et j'en ai marre de les resaisirs à chaque chagement de soft. L'import/Export au format RTF serait vraiment un plus...
summary: Simple comme... un logiciel de notes !

description: все хорошо.хорошее приложение
